trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a time zone cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到時區時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A> and <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> methods when a time zone identifier cannot be found on the local system, or when there is no data associated with a particular time zone identifier.
trans-unit.target: 所擲回這個例外狀況<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A>和<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>時區識別項時，方法找不到在本機系統上，或沒有任何特定的時區識別項相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: Because the registry serves as the repository of time zone information in Windows XP and Windows Vista, this exception indicates that the registry contains no information about a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 因為登錄做為 Windows XP 和 Windows Vista 中的時區資訊的儲存機制，此例外狀況指出登錄包含任何關於特定時區的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Time zone information is stored in the subkeys of HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones.
trans-unit.target: 時區資訊會儲存在 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 區域的子機碼。

trans-unit.source: If an application depends on the presence of a particular time zone and the attempt to retrieve it throws a <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>, the application can handle the exception in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式相依於是否存在特定的時區，以及嘗試擷取它會擲回<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>，應用程式可以處理任一種方式中的例外狀況：

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> method to deserialize a saved <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>方法還原序列化儲存<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the overloads of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method to create a time zone.
trans-unit.target: 透過呼叫其中一個多載<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法來建立的時區。

trans-unit.source: See the examples for the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule%5B%5D%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule%5B%5D%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> class with a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 使用系統提供的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor of the <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式的<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The time zone '*timeZoneName*' was not found on the local computer."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如"時區 '*timeZoneName*' 找不到本機電腦上。 」

trans-unit.source: This message is localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息已針對目前系統文化特性當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> class with the specified message string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息字串，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string is assigned to the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `message`字串指派給<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The string should be localized for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 應該針對目前的文化特性當地語系化字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 包含已序列化資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 包含已序列化資料的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 從序列化資料中，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not called directly by your code to instantiate the <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式並非直接由您的程式碼來具現化呼叫<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>物件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is called by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter> object's <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method when deserializing the <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> object from a stream.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，由呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>物件的<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter.Deserialize%2A>方法還原序列化時<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>從資料流的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="info" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="context" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況的字串。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> overload to handle an exception in a `try`…`catch`
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您使用這個<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>處理例外狀況中的多載`try`...`catch`

trans-unit.source: block.
trans-unit.target: 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The `innerException` parameter should be a reference to the exception object handled in the `catch` block, or it can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: `innerException`參數應該是在處理的例外狀況物件的參考`catch`區塊，或它可以是`null`。

trans-unit.source: This value is then assigned to the <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> object's <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值接著會指派給<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>物件的<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string is assigned to the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `message`字串指派給<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The string should be localized for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 應該針對目前的文化特性當地語系化字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example tries to retrieve a nonexistent time zone, which throws a <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會嘗試擷取不存在時間區域，就會擲回<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>。

trans-unit.source: The exception handler wraps the exception in a new <xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException> object, which the exception handler returns to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況處理常式會包裝在新的例外狀況<xref:System.TimeZoneNotFoundException>例外狀況處理常式傳回給呼叫者的物件。

trans-unit.source: The caller's exception handler then displays information about both the outer and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端的例外狀況處理常式接著會顯示外部和內部例外狀況的相關資訊。
